attempt-text-header.name: Text Formatting
attempt-text-header.description: Settings related to attempt label text formatting.

format.name: Enabled (for Normal Mode)
format.description:
The attempt label will be formatted as such:
`Custom Prefix Text` `attempt count` `Custom Suffix Text`, then trimmed to remove leading and trailing whitespaces.

atempt.name: Use Level Attempt Count (for Normal Mode)
atempt.description: Use the level's attempt count in the attempt label.

attemptPrefix.name: Custom Prefix Text (for Normal Mode)
attemptPrefix.description: Set the custom prefix text (text before the attempt label's attempt count).

attemptSuffix.name: Custom Suffix Text (for Normal Mode)
attemptSuffix.description:
Set the custom suffix text (text after the attempt label's attempt count).

<c_>Ordinal numbers (-st, -nd, -rd, -th) support for the attempt count will ***__NOT__*** happen anytime during this mod's lifecycle.</c>

formaP.name: Enabled (for Practice Mode)
formaP.description:
The attempt label will be formatted as such:
`Custom Prefix Text` `attempt count` `Custom Suffix Text`, then trimmed to remove leading and trailing whitespaces.

<c_>Ordinal numbers (-st, -nd, -rd, -th) support for the attempt count will ***__NOT__*** happen anytime during this mod's lifecycle.</c>

attemP.name: Use Level Attempt Count (for Practice Mode)
attemP.description: Use the level's attempt count in the attempt label when in Practice Mode.

attemptPrefixPractice.name: Custom Prefix Text (for Practice Mode)
attemptPrefixPractice.description: Set the custom prefix text (text before the attempt label's attempt count) when in Practice Mode.

attemptSuffixPractice.name: Custom Suffix Text (for Practice Mode)
attemptSuffixPractice.description:
Set the custom suffix text (text after the attempt label's attempt count) when in Practice Mode.

<c_>Ordinal numbers (-st, -nd, -rd, -th) support for the attempt count will ***__NOT__*** happen anytime during this mod's lifecycle.</c>

formTT.name: Enabled (for Testmode)
formTT.description:
The attempt label will be formatted as such:
`Custom Prefix Text` `attempt count` `Custom Suffix Text`, then trimmed to remove leading and trailing whitespaces.

<c_>Ordinal numbers (-st, -nd, -rd, -th) support for the attempt count will ***__NOT__*** happen anytime during this mod's lifecycle.</c>

attmTT.name: Use Level Attempt Count (for Testmode)
attmTT.description: Use the level's attempt count in the attempt label when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

attemptPrefixTestmode.name: Custom Prefix Text (for Testmode)
attemptPrefixTestmode.description: Set the custom prefix text (text before the attempt label's attempt count) when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

attemptSuffixTestmode.name: Custom Suffix Text (for Testmode)
attemptSuffixTestmode.description: Set the custom suffix text (text after the attempt label's attempt count) when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

custom-color-header.name: Custom Colors
custom-color-header.description: Settings related to attempt label coloring.

colorP.name: Enabled (for Practice Mode)
colorP.description: Enables custom colors when in Practice Mode.

colorPractice.name: Color (for Practice Mode)
colorPractice.description: Set the attempt label's color when in Practice Mode.

colorT.name: Enabled (for Testmode)
colorT.description: Enables custom colors when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

colorTestmode.name: Color (for Testmode)
colorTestmode.description: Set the attempt label's color when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

custom-alpha-header.name: Custom Opacities
custom-alpha-header.description: Settings related to custom opacities for the attempt label.

alphaP.name: Enabled (for Practice Mode)
alphaP.description: Enables opacity customization when in Practice Mode.

alphaPractice.name: Alpha/Opacity (for Practice Mode)
alphaPractice.description: Sets the attempt label's opacity when in Practice Mode.

alphaT.name: Enabled (for Testmode)
alphaT.description: Enables opacity customization when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

alphaTestmode.name: Alpha/Opacity (for Testmode)
alphaTestmode.description: Sets the attempt label's opacity when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

chroma-header.name: Chroma Mode
chroma-header.description:
# <cl>Original code by ItzKiba.</c>
Settings related to Chroma Mode for the attempt label.
<c_>These options WILL override your Custom Colors</c><cy>, but NOT your Custom Opacities.</c>

chromaSpeed.name: Speed (for Normal Mode)
chromaSpeed.description: Sets how quickly (lower value)/slowly (higher value) the attempt label changes color if "Chroma Mode" is enabled.

chromP.name: Enabled (for Practice Mode)
chromP.description: Enables Chroma Mode when in Practice Mode.

chromaSpeedPractice.name: Speed (for Practice Mode)
chromaSpeedPractice.description: Sets how quickly (lower value)/slowly (higher value) the attempt label changes color if "Chroma Mode" is enabled when in Practice Mode.

chromT.name: Enabled (for Testmode)
chromT.description: Enables Chroma Mode when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

chromaSpeedTestmode.name: Speed (for Testmode)
chromaSpeedTestmode.description: Sets how quickly (lower value)/slowly (higher value) the attempt label changes color if "Chroma Mode" is enabled when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

scale-header.name: Scale Customization
scale-header.description: Settings related to attempt label's scale.

scale.name: Scale (for Normal Mode)
scale.description: Sets the scale of the attempt label.

scaleP.name: Enabled (for Practice Mode)
scaleP.description: Enables scale customization when in Practice Mode.

scalePractice.name: Scale (for Practice Mode)
scalePractice.description: Sets the scale of the attempt label when in Practice Mode.

scaleT.name: Enabled (for Testmode)
scaleT.description: Enables scale customization when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

scaleTestmode.name: Scale (for Testmode)
scaleTestmode.description: Sets the scale of the attempt label when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

font-header.name: Font Customization
font-header.description: Settings related to attempt label's font.

cFontB.name: Enabled (for Normal Mode)
cFontB.description: Enables font customization for the attempt label.

font.name: Font # (for Normal Mode)
font.description:
Sets the font of the attempt label. Default is 0 (keep the level's original chosen font).

Notes:
- <cj>-1 for Pusab, -2 for Golden Pusab, -3 for Aller/Helvetica (the font you're reading here right now).</c>
- <cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

cFontP.name: Enabled (for Practice Mode)
cFontP.description: Enables font customization for the attempt label when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

fontPractice.name: Font # (for Practice Mode)
fontPractice.description:
Sets the font of the attempt label when in Practice Mode. Default is 0 (keeps the level's original chosen font).

Notes:
- <cj>-1 for Pusab, -2 for Golden Pusab, -3 for Aller/Helvetica (the font you're reading here right now).</c>
- <cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

cFontT.name: Enabled (for Testmode)
cFontT.description: Enables font customization for the attempt label when in Testmode (playing from a start position).

fontTestmode.name: Font # (for Testmode)
fontTestmode.description:
Sets the font of the attempt label when in Testmode (playing from a start position). Default is 0 (keeps the level's original chosen font).

Notes:
- <cj>-1 for Pusab, -2 for Golden Pusab, -3 for Aller/Helvetica (the font you're reading here right now).</c>
- <cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

blend.name: Readable Mode (Stronger Blending)
blend.description:
# <c_>***__YOU REALLY SHOULDN'T DISABLE THIS UNLESS IF YOU HAVE A DEATH WISH.__***</c>
Makes the attempt label easier to read across a far larger variety of scenarios if using the Aller/Helvetica font for the attempt label.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
